name: Starving Sniper
description:
Hello Guys!

This is my submission for the Mini Jam 56: Sky!

Themes : Doughnut and War zone

You are trying to get recruited for the sniper army, but first you need to accomplish a challenge. Your supervisor wants some Doughnuts, unluckily they are stuck in rooms you can not open. Find a way to open them and maybe you have a chance to get a really epic sniper!

It's basically a Sniper puzzle game I guess.

Hope you enjoy!
